creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Mr and Mrs Makiji Hase
description: tall, narrow rock with two groups of fungus growing on rock; inscription in upper half at R; very long and narrow scroll; L scroll
marks:
Signature, Inscription, and Seals

UR: [ 圍家皆老松/蓊 upper center: [ 信天翁詩畫 ] {Shinten’ō shiga }
title: Rock, from Pine and Rock Pair
